tool.name: HighResPrecursorMassCorrector
tool.description: Corrects the precursor mass and charge determined by the instrument software.
tool.command:
HighResPrecursorMassCorrector
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_out_csv: -out_csv $param_out_csv #end if #if $param_feature_in: -feature:in $param_feature_in #end if #if $param_feature_mz_tolerance: -feature:mz_tolerance $param_feature_mz_tolerance #end if #if $param_feature_mz_tolerance_unit: -feature:mz_tolerance_unit #if " " in str($param_feature_mz_tolerance_unit): "$param_feature_mz_tolerance_unit" #else $param_feature_mz_tolerance_unit #end if #end if #if $param_feature_rt_tolerance: -feature:rt_tolerance $param_feature_rt_tolerance #end if #if $param_feature_believe_charge: -feature:believe_charge #if " " in str($param_feature_believe_charge): "$param_feature_believe_charge" #else $param_feature_believe_charge #end if #end if #if $param_feature_keep_original: -feature:keep_original #if " " in str($param_feature_keep_original): "$param_feature_keep_original" #else $param_feature_keep_original #end if #end if #if $param_feature_assign_all_matching: -feature:assign_all_matching #if " " in str($param_feature_assign_all_matching): "$param_feature_assign_all_matching" #else $param_feature_assign_all_matching #end if #end if #if $param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance: -nearest_peak:mz_tolerance $param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance #end if #if $param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance_unit: -nearest_peak:mz_tolerance_unit #if " " in str($param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance_unit): "$param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance_unit" #else $param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance_unit #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.param_feature_max_trace: -feature:max_trace $adv_opts.param_feature_max_trace #end if #end if

param.name: param_feature_in
param.label: Features used to correct precursor masses

param.name: param_feature_mz_tolerance
param.label: The precursor mass tolerance
param.help: (-mz_tolerance) Used to determine matching to feature mass traces

param.name: param_feature_rt_tolerance
param.label: Additional retention time tolerance added to feature boundaries

param.name: param_feature_believe_charge
param.label: Assume precursor charge to be correct

param.name: param_feature_keep_original
param.label: Make a copy of the precursor and MS2 (true) or discard the original (false)

param.name: param_feature_assign_all_matching
param.label: Correct a precursor using all matching features (true) or only the nearest (false)
param.help: (-assign_all_matching) Only evaluated if copies are created (feature:keep_original)

param.name: param_nearest_peak_mz_tolerance
param.label: The precursor mass tolerance to find the closest MS1 peak

param.name: param_feature_max_trace
param.label: Maximum isotopic trace considered in matching a precursor to a feature

tool.help:
Corrects the precursor mass and charge determined by the instrument software.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_HighResPrecursorMassCorrector.html
